results.title: Evaluation of Adverse Effects of Lisinopril and Rosuvastatin on Hematological and Biochemical Analytes in Wistar Rats
results.text_hl: Combination therapy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Rosuvastatin_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068718 @@@rosuvastatin@@@ may be an important concept in developing more effective strategies to treat and prevent @DISEASE_Atherosclerosis @DISEASE_MESH:D050197 @@@atherosclerosis@@@, @DISEASE_Coronary_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D003327 @@@coronary heart disease@@@, and co-morbid @<m>DISEASE_Metabolic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008659 @@@metabolic disorders@@@.

citations.NLM: Dodiya H, Kale V, Goswami S, Sundar R, Jain M. Evaluation of Adverse Effects of Lisinopril and Rosuvastatin on Hematological and Biochemical Analytes in Wistar Rats Toxicol Int. 2013 May;20(2):170-6. PMID: 24082511
citations.BibTeX: @article{24082511, title={Evaluation of Adverse Effects of Lisinopril and Rosuvastatin on Hematological and Biochemical Analytes in Wistar Rats}, author={Dodiya H and Kale V and Goswami S and Sundar R and Jain M}, journal={Toxicol Int}, volume={20}, number={2}, pages={170-6}}

results.title: Complete remission of non-HIV collapsing glomerulopathy with deflazacort and lisinopril in an adult patient.
results.text_hl: This case report shows the evolution of a 58-year-old @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ with non-HIV @DISEASE_Pulmonary_Atelectasis @DISEASE_MESH:D001261 @@@idiopathic collapsing glomerulopathy@@@ who presented with severe @DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@nephrotic syndrome@@@ and @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency @DISEASE_MESH:D051437 @@@renal insufficiency@@@ and was treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_deflazacort @CHEMICAL_MESH:C021988 @@@deflazacort@@@, a synthetic corticosteroid that has shown fewer cosmetic effects and @CHEMICAL_Glucose @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005947 @@@glucose@@@ and bone @<m>DISEASE_Metabolic_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008659 @@@metabolism@@@ complications than @CHEMICAL_Prednisone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011241 @@@prednisone@@@.

citations.NLM: Vega J, Guarda FJ, Goecke H, Méndez GP. Complete remission of non-HIV collapsing glomerulopathy with deflazacort and lisinopril in an adult patient. Clin Exp Nephrol. 2010 Aug;14(4):385-8. PMID: 20428916
citations.BibTeX: @article{20428916, title={Complete remission of non-HIV collapsing glomerulopathy with deflazacort and lisinopril in an adult patient.}, author={Vega J and Guarda FJ and Goecke H and Méndez GP}, journal={Clin Exp Nephrol}, volume={14}, number={4}, pages={385-8}}
